Entries.cc_Begin: You smell like dust, @!#$b#Huh, Lewis could smell it too? He must have a good nose!
Entries.cc_Boulder: Hey, that boulder by the mines is gone! Now the water smells way more interesting!$h
Entries.cc_Bridge: Someone fixed the bridge! Now I can get across the easy way, instead of having to go all the way around!$h
Entries.cc_Bus: The bus is working! I always wanted to ride, but Pam and Lewis said I'm not allowed on.
Entries.cc_Greenhouse: That new building looks so warm and cozy. You should take some naps in there.
Entries.cc_Minecart: @, can I come ride with you on the cart? It looks fun!
Entries.cc_Complete: Wow, @! Everyone's saying you fixed this up! It must have taken a lot of nails.$h
Entries.movieTheater: There are so many bird friends in the new building!
Entries.willyCrabs: One of those crabs nipped my tail.$s#$b#I guess it was because Jean was trying to eat him.
Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: @, you helped build Pam's new house? I hope you gave her some good scratching posts. She needs to relieve stress sometimes.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: I wonder who helped with Pam's new house? I have no idea! They must be super nice though.$h
Entries.Characters_MovieInvite_Invited: Oh boy, a movie? Let me just get Jean to clean me up, I'll meet you there! ZOOMIES!
Entries.NPC.cs.4275: You got me a birthday present?? You're my favorite human.$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4277: AHHHH YOU GOT ME A BIRTHDAY PRESENT! I'M SO EXCITED I'M GONNA ZOOMIES!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4279: I, uh... Thanks, but I don't really want it, even if it is my birthday....$s/I, uh... Thanks, but I don't really want it, even if it is my birthday....$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4281: Oh boy, a present! Want to share? My birthday's on worker's day, after all, and it's about unity.$h/Oh boy, a present! Want to share? My birthday's on worker's day, after all, and it's about unity.$h
Entries.MobilePhoneGreeting: {{Random: Hi {0}, this is Gil! Okay, it's not really Gil, but he doesn't like his cell phone. && This is Gil's phone, please leave a message after the meow. Meow! && Oh boy! {0} is calling me! && Hi, {0}! I'm taking care of the phone right now, did you want to speak to me or Jean? && Hi, {0}! It's me, your favorite Jorts of all Jortses out there! && Hi, {0}! Smartphones are great, aren't they? They're real easy to use with paws! && Hi, {0}! Do you need me to come find you so I can rub on your legs? |inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.MobilePhoneGoodBye: {{Random: Okay, talk to you later, @! Unless Jean answers instead! && Okay, I love you, bye-bye! && Bye @! I'll say hi to Gil for you too! && Bye, @! Hope I can see you soon, it's not the same if I can't sniff you. |inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.railroadEarthquake: Wow, that earthquake last night was so fun! I vibrated almost as hard as the time I rode Morris's floor polisher!$h
Entries.islandResortUnlocked: There's a giant sandbox on the other side of the sea? Can we go play, Jean? Pretty please?$h
Entries.jojaMartStruckByLightning: Marlon said the Jojamart got struck by that big lightning last night! Good thing it didn't catch on fire, or Clint might've been in trouble!
Entries.babyBoy: Wow, @! I can't believe you and %spouse made a WHOLE baby!
Entries.babyGirl: Wow, @! I can't believe you and %spouse made a WHOLE baby!
Entries.wedding: What a big party! We should have another one sometime!$h
Entries.event_postweddingreception: This must have been really special for you and %spouse, @, since we get to celebrate it twice!$h
Entries.luauBest: Jean and I got some of the soup when Lewis wasn't looking. It was tasty as a sturgeon!$h
Entries.luauShorts: I didn't get to try the soup.$s#$b#Jean said it was 'an offense to dignity and good taste'. How can it offend anyone if it can't talk?$4
Entries.luauPoisoned: Jean said you humans didn't like the soup. It tasted just fine to me though.$5
Entries.AlectoIntroduction: You met the lady with the crows? I like Kevin, he's my friend. Sometimes we investigate the scrungy smells together.
Entries.AlectoWizardTower: Kevin found a scrungy bag and shared it with me! He's the best!$h
Entries.JulietGremlin: Juliet has a new friend!$h#$b#I tried to say hi, but she ran away. Maybe if I give her a fish?$4
Entries.JunaBeachBallet: Juna's very nice! She gives me all sorts of interesting scrungy things to play with!
Entries.JunaJunimos: I found a pink flamingo in the woods!$h#$b#Jean said we can't keep it, so I meowed at the Wizard until he teleported it to Lewis's lost and found. He's so helpful!
Entries.JunaGone: I miss Juna already.$s#$b#But sometimes you have to go somewhere. Jean said it must be important.
Entries.LavrilUnlocked: Aww, what a cute little girl and bunny! She said she wants to be friends! And she gives nice pets!
Entries.LucikielArrives: Do you suppose that man gets cold with no shirt on?$4
Entries.ReputationIncreased: I'm glad Lucikiel is making friends! Maybe they can give him a shirt.$h
Entries.RSV_GH1: Yaaay, Jean said we can go see the new greenhouse in Ridgeside! I'm going to lay in ALL the sunbeams!$h
Entries.keahi_prank: Uh, @? You smell scrungy. Like, really really scrungy.$s#$b#My face is all scrunched up, it's so scrungy.$s
Entries.Lidens_Return: Did you see the lady that looks like Alissa? She smells like salt.
Entries.Naomi_Return: Did you see how happy Yuuma was that his mom's back? He smiled super big, he never does that!$h
Entries.LeilaniArrives: Hey, Leilani's back again! I hope her grades were good this year!
Entries.PTJ03: Sooo many crabs!  Let me help, Morris, let me help!$h
Entries.pumpkin_spice_madness: Are you going to have a pumpkin spice latte, @? Can I dip my paw in it? I promise I washed it.
Entries.TalkingAboutToshinori: Toshinori always gives me tasty things when we visit the bar. He's so nice!
Entries.ToshisSon: That green haired man rescued me from the trash can! He said he rescues cats a lot, so he didn't mind.
Entries.MeetTheCats: You're a good listener, @. Jean says that's a real important skill.$h
Entries.ButteredJorts: I'm not mad at Pam. It's pretty funny now that it's over.#$b#And maybe this will encourage her to lay off the beers some!$h
Entries.DumpsterFishing: Linus brought me some fish scraps the other night that were SUPER scrungy! I guess he found something good.$h
Entries.RubberCatting: If you're feeling sad, @, you can always come rub my belly.$h
Entries.JortsZoomies: It was so much fun to zoomies around the Jojamart! It's like a big cat tree!$h
Entries.OpenAllTheDoors: I'm going to miss having the Jojamart.  I guess we'll just have to make a new union for whoever takes their place!$h
Entries.Shane_Starts_Selling: I saw Shane setting up a bin in Marnie's place.#$b#Huh, it looks like the one that used to be inside Jojamart.$4
Entries.platonic_LetterCS2CT: I love friends! I love you! And I love your friend, too!$h
Entries.JeanandJorts_funstring: Jean really loved the thread you made, so much she hid it in our stash. It's our treasure now.$h
Entries.RestauranteerMod-Liked-1: Thanks, @! You can do anything, can't you?$h
Entries.RestauranteerMod-Liked-2: Thanks, @! I'm going to roll around in it so I can take some with me.$h
Entries.RestauranteerMod-Liked-3: Wow, it smells so scrungy! The good kind!$h
Entries.EliIntro: Eli is so smart! He can get down from high places all on his own!
Entries.EliSaloon: I like Eli! He gives me lots of pets when we sit together on Fridays!$h
Entries.SterlingTrash: Sterling made the trash can scrungy in a bad way.$s
Entries.SterlingTrain: Jean and I saw Sterling jumping around the train tracks. Is that fun?$4
Entries.SterlingDrugs: Sterling smells scrungy in a bad way. Do you think something's wrong?$s
Entries.SterlingRelapse: Sterling isn't feeling well, so I'm going go lay on his stomach and purr a lot, that'll help. I'm not scared of a dog.
Entries.SterlingApology: I'm glad Sterling is coming back to town! It's a really long walk to his house.
Entries.WrenFliesIn: I like that plumber lady, she finds lots of scrungy smells!
Entries.OnTheSheShore: I heard Wren say she started using both she and they pronouns.  I don't really get it, but if it makes them happy,  can do it just fine.$h
Entries.WatchingIsForTheBirds: I want to go watch birds too!
Entries.ThyMet: Thy has such pretty wings! I want her to take me flying sometime so I can meet some bird friends.
Entries.ThyLampsOut: I think it's okay if the lamps are out at night.  I only ran into things two or three times!
Entries.ThysaniaExposed: I think Thy is scared of being different. But that's okay, cause we're all different.
Entries.Mon: Hi @! You smell scrungy today! That's a smell that's so big it makes my nose scrunch up!$h
Entries.Tue: Hiya, @! Have you made any friends yet? If not, I'll be your friend!
Entries.Wed: Hi, @! Have you looked around town? What's your favorite place so far?
Entries.Thu: @, you don't look much like a cat does, but that's okay, we're all different.
Entries.Fri: Do you like it here so far, @? I hope you like sniffing everything.
Entries.Sat: I take the lead whenever Jean needs some quiet time. We make a great team.
Entries.Sun: Ever tried just rolling around in your crops, @? I bet you'd like it.
Entries.Mon2: Okay! Today is a day to meow at people really loudly and stare at them. Time to get started!
Entries.Tue2: Hi @! Are you growing yams? I love yams.$h#$b#I also love fish, but I don't think you can grow those.$4
Entries.Wed2: Whoops coming through sorry didn't mean to flash my butt at you haha gotta go!
Entries.Thu2: Do you have a coop yet, @? It gets cold out, and you don't want birds to be cold!
Entries.Fri2: Do you go to the Saloon on Fridays, @? It's a good place to listen to people.
Entries.Sat2: I like kids. They give really strong belly pets!
Entries.Sun2: I'm awake, just... mmf... resting my eyes....$7
Entries.Mon4: Today I am helping out by being a box inspector. I've jumped and napped in all of them so far and they all seem good.
Entries.Tue4: I'm trying to focus on work, but someone made a sound like a food can opening. C'mon, Jorts, focus.
Entries.Wed4: I do try not to have trashcan mishaps, but those smells are so nice!
Entries.Thu4: %Jorts is absolutely transfixed by a bug in the grass.#$b#SCRUNGY!$h
Entries.Fri4: You ever just have the feline urge to knock things over?
Entries.Sat4: This morning I ran around really fast and knocked all the swords off the wall.#$b#Gil thought it was hilarious. Great job making him happy, me!$h
Entries.Sun4: There's really nothing like rolling around and covering yourself in a scrungy smell. I don't know why humans don't do it.
Entries.Mon6: Humans deserve fair pay and working hours!#$b#And I deserve fish!
Entries.Tue6: What kind of hat do you think would make me look smart, @?#$b#I want to look extra smart for Jean today.$h
Entries.Wed6: I'm always ready to go, @, so if you need to take a nap, I'll guard you.
Entries.Thu6: Not every angel gives me sea bass, but everyone who gives me sea bass is an angel. That's just facts.#$b#No disrespect to all the other angels, though. If they ALL gave me sea bass I might explode!
Entries.Fri6: @, if you ever want my help on the farm, just ask.#$b#I will sit two feet away from you and stare at you so hard you will physically feel my steady, unblinking support.
Entries.Sat6: Jean told me I had an 'urgent' meeting with Marlon, but he just picked me up and wiped my back down.#$b#It was only slime, I don't see what the big deal is.
Entries.Sun6: Jean is the best, you know. She's so smart and cleans me so well. Look at my pretty face!
Entries.Mon8: Marlon got Jean a new cat bed. It almost looks as good as the boot tray I sleep in.#$b#Dunno why he put my name on it, though.$4
Entries.Tue8: If you're ever in an awkward situation, @, you can always turn it around by asking if anyone wants to see a picture of a cat. Then show them my picture.
Entries.Wed8: Hey @, don't forget people love you!$h#$b#And I'm people too!$h
Entries.Thu8: I don't always understand things, so I appreciate it when people take time to educate me.#$b#Even if I still don't completely get it, I feel a lot smarter.
Entries.Fri8: Jean was singing to her cat toy the other day. She sounded so good, even better than that Alanna star that's on the radio.$h
Entries.Sat8: I like watching people make stuff. It's always good, even if they don't think so.#$b#You know why? Because they made it and no one else could have done that.
Entries.Sun8: I had a dream I was on the beach.#$b#It was so sad, everything smelled like fish, but there WERE no fish, just me getting wet everywhere.$s
Entries.Mon10: Here, @! I got you a present! It's really scrungy! [168 126 115 71 105 172 203 430]
Entries.Tue10: Sometimes we need to change the world and we only get that change by scratching hard and meowing loudly.#$b#Sometimes that change is that someone needs to open the door.
Entries.Wed10: Someone once told me I was just being nice and lying to make them feel better, when I said nice things about them.#$b#It hurt my feelings a little. Do they really think I'm a liar?$s
Entries.Thu10: If you ever make a mistake and want to be hard on yourself, @, just say 'Classic Jorts!' instead.#$b#You wouldn't get down on me for making a mistake, right?$h
Entries.Fri10: I'm a cat so I can't fix the big stuff, but I can make a shape like a smiley face just for you, @.
Entries.Sat10: Hey, I hope you got good rest. It doesn't have to be a nap, maybe just some time thinking about something nice.#$b#I'm just saying it because I love you and don't want you to be tired.$h
Entries.Sun10: Hey, @... Don't forget to say 'I love you!' to yourself today.#$b#After all, that's the person you want to hear it from the most, right?$h
Entries.rain: {{Random: Hi, @! Wow, you're wet! && Hiya, @. We're staying inside today. I get bad-scrungy when I'm wet. && I'm protecting Jean today! Scary thunder can't get me!$h && Lots of people get sad when it rains. If you have time, maybe visit some people for us?$h && It's dark right now, but I'm sure there will be more sunbeams.$h |inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.spring_1: I love spring! Everything is green and smells new again!$h
Entries.summer_1: I love summer! It's so warm and nice to lay in the sun!$h
Entries.fall_1: I love fall! Look at all the pretty colors!$h
Entries.winter_1: I love winter! Snow is so fun to play in!$h
Entries.spring_12: Hey, @, want to team up for the Egg Hunt? I can sniff out eggs and you have thumbs! We'd make a great team!
Entries.spring_23: Can you dance, @? I can't dance but I can chase my tail, and that's sort of like dancing.
Entries.summer_10: Have you picked out what you're going to put in the Luau soup?#$b#If not, I bet a really high quality sturgeon would be great. Everyone would like that!$h
Entries.summer_15: Hey, @, did you know it's my birthday? I picked it because this is a worker's holiday in some countries!$h
Entries.summer_27: Tomorrow the jellyfish are coming to visit. They tell me all sorts of fun stories!$h#$b#Once, they told me about this queen that got 'canceled'. I didn't really get it though.$4
Entries.fall_15: Tomorrow is the Stardew Fair. I wonder how many things I can knock off the tables?
Entries.fall_26: It'll be nice and dark at the festival tomorrow. I wonder if everyone would appreciate it if I made spooky sounds and ran around really fast?
Entries.winter_7: I don't get why they bring in all those fish and then don't eat them.$4
Entries.winter_24: Did you get your gift-person something nice for Winter Star? If it's me, I'd like a baked fish.$4
